<!-- Autogenerated from JSR docs. Do not edit directly. -->

> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>Utilities for working with Deno's readers, writers, and web streams.</p>
<p><code>Reader</code> and <code>Writer</code> interfaces are deprecated in Deno, and so many of these
utilities are also deprecated. Consider using web streams instead.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { toReadableStream, toWritableStream } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/io"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-en">toReadableStream</span>(<span class="pl-smi">Deno</span>.<span class="pl-c1">stdin</span>)
  .<span class="pl-en">pipeTo</span>(<span class="pl-en">toWritableStream</span>(<span class="pl-smi">Deno</span>.<span class="pl-c1">stdout</span>));
</code></pre>
